entry.title: When do I listen to Bad Bunny
entry.summary:
Description

Bad Bunny is a singer who's taking over the world and my playlist. I've been tracking my played songs since 2017; that's data containing many rows with BB's name and enough evidence to ask when I will listen to his music? To answer this, I'll use data visualization, clustering â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Bad Bunny is a singer who's taking over the world and my playlist. I've been tracking my played songs since 2017; that's data containing many rows with BB's name and enough evidence to ask when I will listen to his music? To answer this, I'll use data visualization, clustering, and time series.
